document_data.name: Apikusis
document_data.mainbody:
'''Apikusis''' was a [[druid]] who lived in the [[Emerald Grove]] during he late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|More follow Kagha every day. They are afraid and she offers a simple solution - eject the refugees and we will be safe.|Apikusis.}}
document_data.Personality: She was a particularly nervous individual.
document_data.Relationships: She had a friendship with a small bird that offered its services as a messenger.
document_data.History:
In the {{yearlinkName|1492}}, the leader of the Emerald Grove, [[Archdruid]] [[Halsin]] went missing while investigating a [[drow]] that was infected by a [[mind flayer]] parasite. Apikusis was extremely worried about the safety of the grove, and the measures taken to ensure its protection. 

She did not agree with [[Kagha]]'s decision to begin the ''[[Rite of Thorns]]'', a druidic [[ritual]] that would seal the grove away from outsiders. The ritual would trap outside the group of [[tiefling]] refugees that had been exiled from the city of [[Elturel]].

She asked her bird companion to search for some hint as to Halsin's whereabouts.
